subject: Cheating
Colleges and Universities
Athletics and Sports
Scholarships and Fellowships
lead_paragraph: The Florida State football squad will join other university sports teams on self-imposed probation for two years, and some students will lose scholarships due to an academic cheating scandal. The university said in a report that about 60 student-athletes have lost or will lose some eligibility. Two staff members have been fired. The cheating occurred mainly through online testing for a music history course in the fall of 2006 and the spring and summer semesters last year.
